# Example: Download these sample files to test
# Visit: https://freesound.org/search/?q=letter+a+sound
# Look for short, clear recordings of letter sounds

# File structure should be:
# a.mp3 - "ah" sound for A
# b.mp3 - "buh" sound for B
# c.mp3 - "kuh" sound for C
# etc.

# Tip: Search for "phoneme" or "letter sound" on educational sites
